participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: nurturing and supportive, with a focus on family and education.
participant_1.background: I bake a chocolate cake for my grandson every Saturday and we have strawberries together. Both my moms tell me they love me when I call them. I would not be able to be a beekeeper if I were blind because I would not be able to see the bees or their hives. I prefer to read books to get my entertainment, so social media isn't very important to me. My greatest challenge is to make sure that all of my students succeed.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: outgoing and passionate, with a love for music and social issues.
participant_2.background: I used to be afraid to speak my mind, but now I am more confident in expressing my opinions. I sometimes need to scream to feel alive. I know how to play the guitar. I have a passion for politics. I cherish the time I spend with my loved ones.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do?
I love to play the guitar, I think it is so fun!
I used to play when I was younger, but I never really got very good at it.
It takes a lot of practice, but it's so worth it!
Do you play any other instruments?
No, but I've always wanted to learn the drums.
I think drums are really cool, but they're so loud!
That's true, but it's so much fun to bang on the drums.
I bet it is!
Yeah, it really is!
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to read, and I'm also really into politics.
I love to read too! What are your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I'm really into historical fiction right now.
I've never really read any historical fiction, but I've heard it's really good.
It is! You should definitely try reading some.
I will!
What about politics? Are you interested in any current events?
I am! I think it's really important to be informed about what's going on in the world.
I agree! It's so important to be an active participant in our democracy.
I know, it's so important to vote!
Yes it is! I'm so glad that you're a voter.
Thank you! I think it's our duty to vote, especially when there are so many important issues facing our country.
I agree! I'm so glad we could talk about this
